Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class SocketClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<Message<ServerController>>
it.polimi.ingsw.server.SocketClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
public class SocketClientConnection
extends Observable<Message<ServerController>>
implements ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
Class that models an object that handle the socket connections with the clients (on the server).
